text: Mutiny on the Bounty is an MGM movie from 1935 directed by Frank Lloyd and produced by Irving Thalberg. It was directed by Frank Lloyd. It is based on the novel of the same name by Charles Nordoff and James Hall. The movie is about the mutiny on the ship Bounty. It stars Charles Laughton as Captain Bligh, Clark Gable as Fletcher Christian, Franchot Tone as Roger Byam, and Movita Castaneda as a Tahitian girl. All three were nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor. The movie won the 1935 Academy Award for Best Picture. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1935 drama movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:1930s epic movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Lloyd Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies set in French Polynesia Category:Movies set on ships
title: Mutiny on the Bounty (1935 movie)
